h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: If you try to attack from behind, he can even leap up to face you while slashing his tail below him in a retreating strike to stop you from pursuing him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
If you try to attack from behind, he can even leap up to face you while slashing his tail below him in a retreating strike to stop you from pursuing him.
